description:
Practice for the ACT and SAT anywhere, anytime, and achieve your highest score! It’s everything you need to study for the standardized tests, all in one app.

Getting ready for the most crucial exams couldn’t be easier. You can now study and practice at your own pace, without stress and pressure, and achieve great results. All necessary content is available in one app. Select your test date, and receive a study plan tailored personally for your needs. Track your progress, stay motivated, and ace the ACT or SAT!

PERSONALIZED STUDY PLAN
Set a test date, and the app will suggest the optimal daily practice amount for you to study at your own pace and be ready by the test date.

PRACTICE TESTS
Choose to train in a particular subject or topic. Take practice tests in English, Mathematics, Reading, and Science.

PRACTICE EXAMS
Practice in conditions similar to the real ACT and SAT exams. Check your knowledge with time limitations, and get a sense of your predicted score.

CORRECT ANSWERS
Easily check correct answers with detailed explanations, without the need to look for them at the end of a practice book.

FLASHCARDS
Flip and swipe the cards to quickly review SAT/ACT concepts without the need to go through the whole test, complete the right amount of questions for you and get some quick studying in.

KNOWLEDGE BASE
Refresh your knowledge on all of the topics included in the ACT and SAT. If you missed anything in class, you can easily study the subject in the app or even print out handy PDF files with the necessary info for better prep. English, Mathematics, Reading, Science, and Writing lessons are available.

VIDEO LESSONS
Watch ACT and SAT video tutorials to improve your knowledge and get guidance on the test prep.

FAQ 
Check out answers to the most popular questions about ACT and SAT provided by our expert tutor. Or ask him a question that bothers you.

SCORE PREDICTION
Get your ACT score prediction based on how you pass practice exams, and study the topics you need to revisit to improve your score.

PROGRESS TRACKING
Avoid anxiety by constantly tracking your preparedness, increasing your confidence, and preparing for the exam before the test date. Set the app to send you reminders to study. 

TIPS AND RECOMMENDATIONS
Get to know how to successfully get prepared and pass the exam, learn all the strategies, tips, and tricks useful to ace the ACT and SAT.

FAMILY SHARING
Activate your subscription and share your study progress with up to 5 family members.

PerfectPrep will be your most valuable ACT and SAT study resource – helping you prepare, stay motivated, and pass the exam with flying colors.

*Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase.
*Subscriptions will automatically renew and payment will be charged to your iTunes account unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal depends on your Subscription Plan. Our standard Subscription Plans are:

* 1-month Subscription
* 6-month Subscription with a 7-day Trial
For other currencies, the price corresponds to the same price tier on the App Store Pricing Matrix.

* Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew to a paid subscription. You can cancel or manage your free trial's auto-renewal in your Account Settings after purchase. The cancellation will take effect 24-hours after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to the free service.
* Please note: any unused portion of a free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period.

Privacy Policy: https://accellab.app/privacy_policy.html 
EULA: https://accellab.app/eula.html 
California Privacy Notice: https://accellab.app/privacy_policy.html#h 

ACT, Inc. does not endorse, nor is it affiliated in any way with the owner or any content of this application.
